metadata.Title: CVE-2023-30631 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: Improper Input Validation vulnerability in Apache Software Foundation Apache Traffic Server. The configuration option proxy.config.http.push_method_enabled didn't function. However, by default the PUSH method is blocked in the ip_allow configuration file.This issue affects Apache Traffic Server: from 8.0.0 through 9.2.0. 8.x users should upgrade to 8.1.7 or later versions 9.x users should upgrade to 9.2.1 or later versions

criterions.comment: trafficserver package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
